description: When Hollow Realm invaded, Shu Feng awakened as a spirit user and came into contact with the truth of the world. With the power of a mysterious base inside his body, Shu Feng rose step by step in Hollow Realm, Erosion Realm, and Human Realm and finally reached the peak.>
